newsitem.title: UK: UK meals/feeds closed quietly due trade dinner.
newsitem.headline: UK meals/feeds closed quietly due trade dinner.

text.p: UK meals and feeds closed quietly and unchanged again due to many traders being absent to attend the annual European commodities trade fair in Antwerp.
A mixed close on the Chicago soybean meal futures left those traders not attending the trade fair uncertain over the UK market's next direction.
"The market was basically dead today. On Monday we'll take a look at how Chicago finished tonight and take it from there," one trader said.
